Name: consumer_loan_amount_helper
clcommon__Content__c:
Is there a limit to the amount of money I can borrow?
Yes, Thrive Bank limits the amount of money Individuals can borrow up to $25,000. If you are looking to borrow more than $25,000, please contact your local branch to discuss your credit options

Why do I need to provide this?
Purpose tells us how you plan to use the proceeds of the loan and helps us to determine your eligibility and collateral requirements.
